data.name: QUBIC
data.detailed_description:
QUBIC is a retro-like turn-based puzzle game in which your task is to solve the labyrinth, collect the stars to unlock next level, avoid enemies/traps and... SAVE YOUR QUBIC GREEN ASS!

Key features:

  • Different levels that will blow your brain!
  • Mad retro-like 16bit pixel graphics!
  • Fast turn-based game-play!
  • Simple controls and cubic-like visual style.
  • Prepare for DOUBLE-PENE... TROUBLE!
  • Awesome soundtracks included.
  • Amazing backgrounds & emoticons that will allow you to make GODLIKE Steam Profile page by using pixels!

data.short_description: QUBIC is a retro-like turn-based puzzle game in which your task is to solve the labyrinth, collect the stars to unlock next level, avoid enemies/traps and... SAVE YOUR QUBIC GREEN ASS!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian*, Swedish, Ukrainian, German
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“DOUBLE-PENE... TROUBLE!”
СЛИШКОМ МНОГО КУБОВ – Developers! Developers! Developers! Developers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Of course! If you want to hear something! c:
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard AND mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz+
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Of course! If you want to hear something! c:
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard AND mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Of course! If you want to hear something! c:
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard AND mouse
